signals.Ask: We need a tool that allows us to assign incoming emails to specific team members.
signals.Evidence: I was hoping to find something where it could, you know, auto assign that to jess or to Alex or whoever.

signals.Ask: The solution should support automation based on subject lines to streamline email handling.
signals.Evidence: I realized that there's probably like either programmable codable components to it and or at least at the very least the start of AI inside of, you know, we get the same a lot.

signals.Ask: We require personalized onboarding support to set up the system effectively.
signals.Evidence: If you do pro for at least five users, you are going to get a personalized onboarding support.

signals.Ask: We need reporting features to track team response rates and workload management.
signals.Evidence: I remember reading on your guys site about theâ€¦ app, helping me track my team's like response rate.

signals.Ask: We need flexible pricing options as we scale our team size.
signals.Evidence: If we were on the pro plan and we do end up adding the extra two individuals probably within the next two months.
